1: 사람이나 사물 따위가 달아나지 못하도록 잡다.

0: To hold something so as not to drop or lose it.
To hold someone to keep him/her from running away.
To stop someone to keep him/her from walking on.

1: 일거리를 삼거나 일을 시작하려고 손을 대다.
쓰러지거나 흔들리지 않게 잡아 주거나 도와주다.
사람 또는 물품 따위를 자기 것으로 만들다.

0: To hold something firmly so as not to lose it.
To grab a person or thing that is running way.
To stop someone to keep him/her from leaving or passing by.
To get or start a job.
To hold a thing or person to prevent it from faltering or falling down.
To continue with what one has been doing or saying, etc.
To catch hold of a good opportunity or person without losing it or him/her.

1: 움직이거나 다른 곳으로 옮겨 가지 못하도록 꼭 붙게 되거나 박히다. ‘붙박다’의 피동사.
남에게 의지하여 물질적인 이득이나 도움을 얻다.

0: To rely on and owe to someone.
To live in a certain place.
be held; be grasped; be grabbed
For something to be held firmly so as not to be lost.
For a person or thing running away to be caught.
To be stopped so as not to be able to depart or pass thorugh .

1: 어떤 일에 나서다. 또는 어떤 일에 매달리다.
어떤 장소에 오래 머무르다. 또는 어떤 판에 끼어들다.

0: For something to adhere to something else and not come off easily.
For fire to begin to spread.
To embark on or hold on to certain work.
For a facility to be attached to something.
For a condition, reason, excuse, etc., to be followed.
stay long; do not leave one's post
To be added to the main part of something.
For clothes to be very tight.
For objects or people to be close to each other.
To depend on others for one's living.
attend on; wait on; go along with
To take care of or follow someone right next to him/her.
To participate in work, a game, group, etc.
go over to; attach oneself to
be possessed with; be haunted by
For a ghost, etc., to inhabit a person, place, etc.
For one's skill, etc., to grow or be created.
For something to be added or created.
For a new name, reputation, etc., to be given.
(slang) For a person to feel that someone of the opposite sex is attractive and follow him/her.
For a match, fight, etc., to begin.
For a feeling or sense to arise.
For a female and a male to mate.
(slang) For a man and a woman to be on intimate terms or have a sexual relationship.

1: 사람이나 어떤 일에 매여 벗어나지 못하다.
조건, 이유, 구실 따위를 딸리게 하다. ‘붙다[1]「6」’의 사동사.
주가 되는 것에 달리게 하거나 딸리게 하다. ‘붙다[1]「9」’의 사동사.
내기를 하는 데 돈을 태워 놓다.

0: To make something not come off somewhere.
To cause something to start burning.
To add a condition, reason, explanation, etc.
For a plant to take root.
To make something attached to a main, basic thing.
put close to; bring near to
To make one thing touch another thing, or be very close to it.
have someone in attendance; let someone be attended
To make someone stay beside and take care of another person.
To make something be added or created.
To decide a name, title, etc.
To cause a feeling, sense, etc., to arise.
To begin to talk in order to communicate with someone.
To make someone join in doing something or join a group.
To hit someone on his/her cheek or hip strongly.
To shout a command with a loud voice.
To make people begin a competition, fight, etc.
To make a male and a female mate for reproduction.
To make someone be close to another person.
To make someone pass an examination, etc.
To add interest, a tax, etc., to a principal.
To salute with one's hand on one side of one's forehead.
To have a fixed place to live or have meals for a while.

1: 움직이거나 다른 곳으로 옮겨 가지 못하도록 꼭 붙이거나 박아 놓다.

0: To fasten or hammer something to or into somewhere so that it does not move.
be held; be grasped; be grabbed
For something to be firmly grabbed so as not to be lost.
be caught; be stopped; be seized
To be caught so as not to be able to run way.
To be stopped so as not to keep moving on.
To come to stick to something.
